creator: backhous@us.ibm.com
text:
The standard-examples war packaged with JSTL 1.1 contains two jsps that will not translate in a JSP 2.0 container /import/LocalQueryString.jsp(11,8) "${param:name}" contains invalid expression(s) Need to change
to
and to org.apache.jasper.JasperException: /xml/Filter.jsp(11,0) Unable to load tag handler class "org.apache.taglibs.standard.extra.spath.SPathTag" for tag "ex:SPath" This custom tag is not found in the war in either WEB-INF/classes or in any jar in WEB-INF/lib

LocalQueryString.jsp was not used anywhere. I've removed it from the source tree.
As for /xml/Filter.jsp, this is a duplicate of 25638.
creator: pierre.delisle@sun.com
